course_description: Introduction to electricity, magnetism, optics, and the essentials of quantum mechanics, atomic and nuclear physics, and special relativity.
prerequisites: This course requires PHYS 141 OR PHYS_OX 141 OR PHYS 151 OR PHYS_OX 151 or equivalent transfer credit as a prerequisite.
